[SEC] 1. Introduction.[SUBSEC] 1.1 Purpose: The Automated Display System (ADS) defines requirements for real-time updates, adaptive projection, and scheduled content management.
[SEC] 1. Introduction.[SUBSEC] 1.2 Scope: ADS optimizes digital displays by adjusting brightness and scheduling updates for visibility in varied lighting.

[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.1 System Interfaces: ADS integrates with IoT sensors and cloud-based management platforms.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.2 User Interfaces: ADS provides a web dashboard and mobile application for display control.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.3 Hardware Interfaces: ADS supports LED screens, projectors, and environmental sensors.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.4 Software Interfaces: ADS uses REST APIs for content updates.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.5 Communications Interfa: ADS uses WebSockets and TLS 1.3 for secure transfer.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.6 Memory Constraints: ADS uses caching for offline functionality.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.7 Operations: ADS maintains continuous operation with automated self-checks.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.8 Site Adaptation Requir: ADS supports multi-location deployment with adaptive settings.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.9 Interfaces with Servic: ADS links to cloud storage and analytics.

[SEC] 1. Introduction.[SUBSEC] 1.4 Product Functions: ADS provides automated display updates, brightness control, and remote monitoring capabilities.
[SEC] 1. Introduction.[SUBSEC] 1.5 User Characteristics: ADS users include system administrators and display operators.
[SEC] 1. Introduction.[SUBSEC] 1.6 Limitations: ADS requires network and compatible hardware.
[SEC] 1. Introduction.[SUBSEC] 1.7 Assumptions and Dependencie: ADS requires cloud connectivity for updates.

[SUBSEC] 2.1 External Interfaces.REQ-INTF-001: The system shall integrate with IoT devices and scheduling APIs for automated display updates.
[SUBSEC] 2.1 External Interfaces.REQ-INTF-002: The system shall synchronize content with cloud storage for remote access and backup.

[SUBSEC] 2.2 Functions.REQ-FUNC-001: The system shall refresh display content every 60 seconds (REQ-INTF-001).
[SUBSEC] 2.2 Functions.REQ-FUNC-002: The system shall dynamically adjust brightness based on ambient lighting conditions (REQ-PERF-002).
[SUBSEC] 2.2 Functions.REQ-FUNC-003: The system shall allow administrators to schedule content updates in advance (REQ-DB-001).

[SUBSEC] 2.3 Usability Requirements.REQ-USAB-001: The system shall provide a web dashboard for display control.
[SUBSEC] 2.3 Usability Requirements.REQ-USAB-002: The system shall support previewing scheduled updates before deployment.

[SUBSEC] 2.4 Performance Requirements.REQ-PERF-001: The system shall update display content within 1 second of receiving new data.
[SUBSEC] 2.4 Performance Requirements.REQ-PERF-002: The system shall apply brightness adjustments within 500 milliseconds.

[SUBSEC] 2.5 Logical Database Requiremen.REQ-DB-001: The system shall store content schedules for up to 30 days.
[SUBSEC] 2.5 Logical Database Requiremen.REQ-DB-002: The system shall log display events and errors.

[SUBSEC] 2.6 Design Constraints.REQ-DSGN-001: The system shall comply with WCAG 2.1 accessibility guidelines.
[SUBSEC] 2.6 Design Constraints.REQ-DSGN-002: The system shall encrypt all data transmissions using TLS 1.3.

[SUBSEC] 2.7 Standards Compliance.REQ-COMP-001: The system shall adhere to ISO/IEC 27001 security standards.
[SUBSEC] 2.7 Standards Compliance.REQ-COMP-002: The system shall meet international display calibration standards.

[SUBSEC] 2.8 Software System Attributes.REQ-ATTR-001: The system shall support automatic software and content updates.
[SUBSEC] 2.8 Software System Attributes.REQ-ATTR-002: The system shall maintain a minimum uptime of 99.9%.

[SEC] 3. Verification: Tests content refresh, brightness control, scheduling, and logging across display types.
[SEC] 4. Supporting Information: System architecture, API documentation, and compliance reports.
